channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Appeals court lets Trump keep control of National Guard troops deployed to Los Angeles
item.description: An appeals court is allowing President Donald Trump to keep control of National Guard troops he deployed to Los Angeles following protests over immigration raids.

item.title: Juneteenth celebrations across the US commemorate the end of slavery
Photos of Juneteenth celebrations commemorating end to slavery
